an8.57:4.1: “Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an8.57:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti … pe …
an8.57:4.9: catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an8.57:4.12: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati;
an8.57:4.17: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe …
